channel.title: CVE Feed for SAP -- Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform (Web intelligence)
channel.description: The latest CVEs for SAP -- Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform (Web intelligence)

item.title: CVE-2022-41263|2024-08-03T12:42:44.077Z -- sap -- business%20objects%20business%20intelligence%20platform%20%28web%20intelligence%29
item.description: Due to a missing authentication check, SAP Business Objects Business Intelligence Platform (Web Intelligence) - versions 420, 430, allows an authenticated non-administrator attacker to modify the data source information for a document that is otherwise restricted. On successful exploitation, the attacker can modify information causing a limited impact on the integrity of the application.
